Posts.Content: Mar 5, 2013 06:31AM thehelp wrote: Hello Kpr, how are you holding up? I would like to help you. I have been looking for someone who has been diagnosed but has not started treatment yet to help. I have to talk to you first. I will wait for your reply and we will take it from there.
Posts.Title: how many people will I tell about the cancer? kpr msphil
